title: Video Emerges of Kamala Harris Questioning if Young People Should Forgo Having Children Because of Climate Change
content:
Skip to comments.
Posted on 07/28/2024 7:15:30 AM PDT by ChicagoConservative27
A video has emerged showing previous comments of Vice President Kamala Harris questioning whether young people should forgo having children due to ‚Äúclimate anxiety.‚Äù While speaking at Reading Area Community College in Reading, Pennsylvania, Harris spoke about how during the 2020 presidential election, there was a ‚Äúrecord turnout‚Äù because younger voters showed up. Harris added how young voters were vocal about how they were ‚Äúgoing to direct and decide‚Äù the future of our nation, and how they have taken charge of issues such as climate change.
(Excerpt) Read more at breitbart.com ...

TOPICS: Culture/Society; Government; News/Current Events; Politics/Elections
KEYWORDS: anchorbaby; babykiller; childless; children; climatechange; harris; video
